main event: An observer reported seeing a yellow flickering light in the sky, which disappeared after approximately one minute.
interesting points: The observer described the light as rising slowly or receding before it vanished., The sighting was categorized as Concl-Visual., The observation was documented in the Project Blue Book record., There was no accompanying photograph or physical evidence from the sighting., The conclusion mentioned a possibility of it being a hot air balloon.
witness description: The observer reported seeing the light with no additional witnesses noted.
